title: Where to buy typography posters online
content:
Im looking at getting some typographic posters for my room. Ideally id like to get a fairly big Helvetica poster but im not to fussed. Ive had a look on the internet for some websites but have had no luck at all. So is there any sites out there that sell typographic posters?

thanks
author: eddrobertson

comments.content:
FontLab has a few posters for sale too, at:

[http://www.fontlab.com/typographic-resources/font-typography-books/type-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223160125/http:/www.fontlab.com/typographic-resources/font-typography-books/type-posters.html "http://www.fontlab.com/typographic-resources/font-typography-books/type-posters.html")

A couple of them might be useful for decorating.

Just came across this post in my search for a new typographic poster for my walls. After spending hours and days searching for the right one, I finally found Danish design agency Playtype. Wow, they have done some amazingly simple and minimalistic posters. Just wanted to share with other typo-lovers :-) btw. found them here: [www.theposterclub.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223160125/http:/www.theposterclub.com/ "www.theposterclub.com") - ended up buying two and got free shipping. So happy :-)
